TextView.android:text: For ATM cash withdrawals, SBI allows you to withdraw up to Rs. 10,000 without the One Time Password(OTP). This rule was implemented to make your ATM transactions more secure. If you are withdrawing more than Rs. 10,000, the bank will send you an OTP on your registered mobile number.Once the account holder exceeds the permitted number of free transactions in a month, SBI levies a fee of Rs 20 per financial transaction at other ATMs and Rs 10 per transaction at its own ATMs, excluding GST, according to its website.
